variable.comment: boolean to toggle actions between levels
variable.name: midLevelActions

variable.comment: Checks to see if game has started.
variable.name: gameStart

events.comment: Issue: how to change camera view

sub-events.comment: Rotate 360 degrees for immediate rotation towards enemy. Can be lowered, but will greatly lower accuracy.

event-group.title: MenuTurret

sub-events.comment: Road: path that enemies tread on. Towers can't be placed there
